definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Where do light and fermions come from?
Particles, such as electrons, requiring antisymmetric wave functions are called fermions.
sentences.chinese: 要求反對稱波函數的粒子，如電子，叫做費米子。

sentences.english: PROVERBIAL APPLES AND ORANGES are as different as the types of quantum particles called fermions and bosons.
sentences.chinese: 費米子與玻色子的差異之大，有如橘子與蘋果的不同。

sentences.english: The tricritical point in the temperature-polarization plane is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 在溫度和費米子極化的相圖上得到了三相點的位置。

sentences.english: The effect from fermion fields is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 也討論了費米子場的效應。
